purpose: Facilitates the creation and management of language model-driven agents using a graph-based approach
principle: Builds on LangChain for language model orchestration and FastAPI for API interfacing
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API endpoints for easy integration and extension
limitations: Currently in alpha stage; may lack comprehensive documentation and stability
name: LangGraph-Chatchat
highlight: Integration of LangChain with FastAPI for building language model-based applications
